name: The Death of Meaning
description: In The Origin of Species Darwin concluded there was no evidence to suggest that life was designed by a higher power. A corollary of this is that our lives lack any necessary purpose or meaning. Our readings will be directed to the question of what it means to lack â€˜Meaningâ€™. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
